# ⭐⭐⭐ Hard & Very Hard Python Programs (601-1000)

**Difficulty:** ⭐⭐⭐ Hard to ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ Very Hard | **Time:** 2-10+ hours each

---

## Issue Groups

### #014 - 50 Algorithms Implementation Programs
**Files:** `basics/10_advanced/601_*` to `basics/10_advanced/650_*`  
**Skills:** Searching, sorting, graph algorithms, dynamic programming

**Programs Included:**
601. Implement Binary Search
602. Implement Linear Search
603. Implement Ternary Search
604. Implement Exponential Search
605. Implement Interpolation Search
606. Implement Jump Search
607. Implement Fibonacci Search
608. Implement BFS (Breadth-First Search)
609. Implement DFS (Depth-First Search)
610. Implement Dijkstra's Algorithm
611. Implement Bellman-Ford Algorithm
612. Implement Floyd-Warshall Algorithm
613. Implement A* Search Algorithm
614. Implement Greedy Algorithm
615. Implement Dynamic Programming
616. Implement Divide and Conquer
617. Implement Backtracking
618. Implement Branch and Bound
619. Solve Traveling Salesman Problem
620. Solve Knapsack Problem
621. Solve Longest Common Subsequence
622. Solve Longest Increasing Subsequence
623. Solve Edit Distance Problem
624. Solve Matrix Chain Multiplication
625. Solve Coin Change Problem
626. Solve Subset Sum Problem
627. Solve Partition Problem
628. Solve Job Sequencing Problem
629. Solve Activity Selection Problem
630. Solve Fractional Knapsack
631. Solve Huffman Coding
632. Solve N-Queens Problem
633. Solve Sudoku Solver
634. Solve Maze Solver
635. Solve Rat in a Maze
636. Implement Rabin-Karp Algorithm
637. Implement KMP Algorithm
638. Implement Z Algorithm
639. Implement Manacher's Algorithm
640. Implement Boyer-Moore Algorithm
641. Implement Segment Tree
642. Implement Fenwick Tree (BIT)
643. Implement Trie (Prefix Tree)
644. Implement AVL Tree
645. Implement Red-Black Tree
646. Implement B-Tree
647. Implement B+ Tree
648. Implement Heap Data Structure
649. Implement Priority Queue
650. Implement Disjoint Set Union

### #019 - 150 Advanced Production & Research Programs
**Files:** `projects/capstone/851_*` to `projects/capstone/1000_*`  
**Skills:** Distributed systems, advanced ML, production systems, complete applications

**Categories:**

#### Distributed Systems (851-880) - 30 Programs
- Distributed Key-Value Store
- Distributed Cache (Redis Clone)
- Distributed File System
- Distributed Database
- Consensus Algorithms (Raft, Paxos)
- Distributed Lock Service
- Message Broker (Kafka Clone)
- Event Streaming Platform
- And 22 more...

- [ ] #018 - 50 Machine Learning from Scratch Programs

---

## Skills You'll Learn

✅ **Algorithms** - Search, sort, graph, DP, greedy  
✅ **Data Structures** - Trees, graphs, hash tables, advanced DS  
✅ **Design Patterns** - GoF, enterprise, architectural  
✅ **System Design** - Scalability, real-world apps  
✅ **Machine Learning** - From scratch implementations  
✅ **Production Systems** - CI/CD, monitoring, deployment  
✅ **Distributed Systems** - Consensus, caching, messaging  
✅ **Advanced AI** - Transformers, GANs, RL, federated learning  

---

## How to Submit

1. **Pick an issue group** based on your skill level
2. **For Hard groups (#014-#018)**: Create all 50 programs
3. **For Very Hard (#019)**: Pick individual programs or complete categories
4. **Add comprehensive documentation** for complex programs
5. **Include tests** and example usage
6. **Submit PR** with issue number in title

---

## Difficulty Guide

| Group | Difficulty | Time per Program | Prerequisites |
|-------|------------|------------------|---------------|
| #014 | ⭐⭐⭐ Hard | 2-5 hours | Basic algorithms |
| #015 | ⭐⭐⭐ Hard | 2-5 hours | Data structures |
| #016 | ⭐⭐⭐ Hard | 2-4 hours | OOP knowledge |
| #017 | ⭐⭐⭐⭐ Very Hard | 5-10 hours | System design |
| #018 | ⭐⭐⭐⭐ Very Hard | 5-10 hours | ML fundamentals |
| #019 | ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ Expert | 10+ hours | Advanced knowledge |
